00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/cxx/std_alloc>
00028 #include <l4/cxx/std_ops>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/type_traits>
00030 #include <l4/cxx/avl_tree>

00032 namespace cxx {
00042 template< typename Node, typename Key, typename Node_op >
00043 class __Avl_set_iter : public Bits::__Bst_iter_b<Node, Node_op>
00044 {
00045 private:
00047   typedef Bits::__Bst_iter_b<Node, Node_op> Base;
00048 
00049   using Base::_n;
00050   using Base::_r;
00051   using Base::inc;
00052 
00053 public:
00055   __Avl_set_iter() {}
00056 
00062   __Avl_set_iter(Node const *t) : Base(t) {}
00063 
00064   __Avl_set_iter(Base const &o) : Base(o) {}
00065 
00066 //  template<typename Key2>
00067   __Avl_set_iter(__Avl_set_iter<Node, typename Type_traits<Key>::Non_const_type, Node_op> const &o)
00068   : Base(o) {}
00069 
00074   Key &operator * () const { return const_cast<Node*>(_n)->item; }
00079   Key *operator -> () const { return &const_cast<Node*>(_n)->item; }
00083   __Avl_set_iter &operator ++ () { inc(); return *this; }
00087   __Avl_set_iter &operator ++ (int)
00088   { __Avl_set_iter tmp = *this; inc(); return tmp; }
00089 
00090 };
00091 
00092 
00104 template< typename Item, class Compare = Lt_functor<Item>,
00105   template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator >
00106 class Avl_set
00107 {
00108 public:
00109   enum
00110   {
00111     E_noent =  2,
00112     E_exist = 17,
00113     E_nomem = 12,
00114     E_inval = 22
00115   };
00117   typedef Item Item_type;
00118   typedef typename Type_traits<Item>::Const_type Const_item_type;
00120   typedef Compare Item_compare;
00121 
00122 
00123 private:
00124 
00126   class _Node : public Avl_tree_node
00127   {
00128   public:
00130     Item_type  item;
00131 
00132     _Node() : Avl_tree_node(), item() {}
00133 
00134     _Node(Item_type const &item) : Avl_tree_node(), item(item) {}
00135   };
00136 
00137   struct Get_key
00138   {
00139     typedef Item Key_type;
00140     static Key_type const &key_of(_Node const *n)
00141     { return n->item; }
00142   };
00143 
00144 public:
00148   class Node
00149   {
00150   private:
00151     struct No_type;
00152     friend class Avl_set<Item, Compare, Alloc>;
00153     _Node const *_n;
00154     explicit Node(_Node const *n) : _n(n) {}
00155 
00156   public:
00158     Node() : _n(0) {}
00159 
00161     Node &operator = (Node const &o) { _n = o._n; return *this; }
00162 
00164     Item const &operator * () { return _n->item; }
00166     Item const *operator -> () { return &_n->item; }
00167 
00172     bool valid() const { return _n; }
00173 
00175     operator Item const * () { if (_n) return &_n->item; else return 0; }
00176   };
00177 
00179   typedef Alloc<_Node> Node_allocator;
00180 
00181 private:
00182   typedef Avl_tree<_Node, Get_key, Compare> Tree;
00183   Tree _tree;
00185   Node_allocator _alloc;
00186 
00187   void operator = (Avl_set const &);
00188 
00189   typedef typename Tree::Fwd_iter_ops Fwd;
00190   typedef typename Tree::Rev_iter_ops Rev;
00191 
00192 public:
00193   typedef typename Type_traits<Item>::Param_type Item_param_type;
00194 
00196   typedef __Avl_set_iter<_Node, Item_type, Fwd> Iterator;
00197   typedef Iterator iterator;
00199   typedef __Avl_set_iter<_Node, Const_item_type, Fwd> Const_iterator;
00200   typedef Const_iterator const_iterator;
00202   typedef __Avl_set_iter<_Node, Item_type, Rev> Rev_iterator;
00203   typedef Rev_iterator reverse_iterator;
00205   typedef __Avl_set_iter<_Node, Const_item_type, Rev> Const_rev_iterator;
00206   typedef Const_rev_iterator const_reverse_iterator;
00207 
00215   explicit Avl_set(Node_allocator const &alloc = Node_allocator()) 
00216   : _tree(), _alloc(alloc)
00217   {}
00218 
00223   inline Avl_set(Avl_set const &o);
00224 
00234   cxx::Pair<Iterator, int> insert(Item_type const &item);
00235 
00242   int remove(Item_type const &item)
00243   {
00244     _Node *n = _tree.remove(item);
00245     if ((long)n == -E_inval)
00246       return -E_inval;
00247 
00248     if (n)
00249       {
00250         n->~_Node();
00251   _alloc.free(n);
00252   return 0;
00253       }
00254 
00255     return -E_noent;
00256   }
00257 
00258   int erase(Item_type const &item)
00259   { return remove(item); }
00260 
00267   Node find_node(Item_type const &item) const
00268   { return Node(_tree.find_node(item)); }
00269 
00275   Node lower_bound_node(Item_type const &key) const
00276   { return Node(_tree.lower_bound_node(key)); }
00277 
00278 
00283   Const_iterator begin() const { return _tree.begin(); }
00288   Const_iterator end() const   { return _tree.end(); }
00289   
00294   Iterator begin() { return _tree.begin(); }
00299   Iterator end()   { return _tree.end(); }
00300 
00305   Const_rev_iterator rbegin() const { return _tree.rbegin(); }
00310   Const_rev_iterator rend() const   { return _tree.rend(); }
00311 
00316   Rev_iterator rbegin() { return _tree.rbegin(); }
00321   Rev_iterator rend()   { return _tree.rend(); }
00322 
00323   Const_iterator find(Item_type const &item) const
00324   { return _tree.find(item); }
00325 
00326 
00327 };
00328 
00329 
00330 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00331 /* Implementation of AVL Tree */
00332 
00333 /* Create a copy */
00334 template< typename Item, class Compare, template<typename A> class Alloc >
00335 Avl_set<Item,Compare,Alloc>::Avl_set(Avl_set const &o)
00336   : _tree(), _alloc(o._alloc)
00337 {
00338   for (Const_iterator i = o.begin(); i != o.end(); ++i)
00339     insert(*i);
00340 }
00341 
00342 /* Insert new _Node. */
00343 template< typename Item, class Compare, template< typename A > class Alloc >
00344 Pair<typename Avl_set<Item,Compare,Alloc>::Iterator, int>
00345 Avl_set<Item,Compare,Alloc>::insert(Item const &item)
00346 {
00347   _Node *n = _alloc.alloc();
00348   if (!n)
00349     return cxx::pair(end(), -E_nomem);
00350 
00351   new (n, Nothrow()) _Node(item);
00352   Pair<_Node *, bool> err = _tree.insert(n);
00353   if (!err.second)
00354     _alloc.free(n);
00355 
00356   return cxx::pair(Iterator(typename Tree::Iterator(err.first, err.first)), err.second ? 0 : -E_exist);
00357 }
00358 
00359 }
